response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $750,000. This represents a significant saving for you, considering the product's true worth is $800,000. I trust this proposal will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing the details further if you decide to accept. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 750000}
